mapper.update: update app_hospital set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, website = #{website,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, property = #{property,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, address, description, level, website, area, type, image, phone, property, code from app_hospital where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, name, address, description, level, website, area, type, image, phone, property, code from app_hospital
select * from app_hospital where name like #{0}
